```{r}
age <- c(34, 28, 22, 36, 27, 18, 52, 39, 42, 29, 35, 31, 27, 22, 37, 34, 19, 20, 57, 49, 50, 37, 46, 25, 17, 37, 42, 53, 41, 51, 35, 24, 33, 41)

length(age)

num_points <- length(age)

print(num_points)

recip_age <- 1 / age

print(recip_age)


new_age <- c(age, 0, age)
print(new_age)

sorted_age <- sort(age)

print(sorted_age)

max_age <- max(age)

print(paste("Maximum value:", max_age))
```
